improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero.  The variable 'x' is decremented to 0 in the loop, leading to a division by zero error in line 10. Add a check to prevent this.
Unreachable code. The loop will always execute 10 times causing the code on line 7 to be unreachable.
The variable y is initialized to 0 and never used before line 9. Consider removing or using it in a meaningful way. This also improves performance.
Potential division by zero. The program divides 1 by x. If x evaluates to 0, then a division by zero error occurs. Add a check before the division to make sure that x is not 0.
